column3: 2U server with 2x Xeon Gold 6338 64 cores 512GB RAM 2TB SSD
50TB all-flash SSD storage for artifacts and container images
Fiber optic transceivers for server connectivity
Enterprise Linux for build agents (8 servers)
Artifact repository for Maven npm Docker images
Hardware support for PowerEdge and Unity

column4: Annual savings vs GitHub Actions at $21/user/month for 50 users ($12600/year) + runner compute ($100800/year estimated for 5000 builds/day)
Annual savings on artifact download egress at $0.09/GB (assume 400GB/day downloads from cloud artifact storage)
Faster build times (on-prem < 5min queue vs 10-15min cloud) save 30min/developer/week = $50K annual value
